term.title: quantity

item.text: Attribute of a phenomenon, body or substance that may be distinguished qualitatively and determined quantitatively.

notes.item: The term quantity may refer to a quantity in a general sense, for example length, mass, or to a particular quantity, for example length of a particular rod, mass of a specified object.
The term kind-of-quantity refers to the abstract concept of a quantity common to a group of related quantities.
